Posts.Content: chemo brain or general doofus? I’m not sure where this post will appear but if it doesn’t go in the right place any pointers would be appreciated? EC round 2 today. Everything went relatively well eept seeing the wig lady. I’ve been cold capping and about three days ago it started coming out, not in great big handfuls but definitely thinning. I told the wig lady I didn’t want to pay for the witoday as I’m going to persevere, she kind of smirked and said she wouldn’t send them back as she’s sure she’ll be seeing me again. Thanks for that! Harrumph! Some people are in the wrong job! Oh welsanity not vanity I suppose  I have no idea why a number of random letters have been replaced with that emoticon face!
Posts.Title: I don’t know how to put this post in the August chemo club!
